name: Apple Crumb Pie
author: Janet Welter
instructions: Peel and slice apples; put in a large bowl. Add flour, sugar and spice; mix with apples. Let sit until apples get a moist look. Put in a 9 inch pie crust. Mix together 1⁄2 cup of sugar, 3/4 cup of flour and the oleo. Sprinkle on top of the apple mixture. Topping will be crumbly. Bake at 400° for 30 to 40 minutes or until golden brown.
